Package me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.core

Class Summary
ArrayIterator<E> Iterator implementation which wraps a given array
DataTerminatingInputStream InputStream which takes care of correctly terminating the DATA command.
LMTPRequest  
SMTPByteArrayMessageImpl SMTPByteArrayMessage implementation which just use given byte arrays
SMTPMessageImpl SMTPMessage implementation which use the given InputStream's
SMTPRequestImpl  
SMTPResponseImpl SMTPResponse implementation which use a ArrayList to hold response lines
StringUtils Utility class which helps to convert objects to String's
